name: Video Amusement Game Supplies
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell coin-operated amusement machines, equipment,
and supplies. Products for sale may include video game machines,
juke boxes, pinball machines, slot machines, mechanical games, and
instant photograph booths.
For merchants that operate video and game arcades, use MCC
7994.
